changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `user` ( `user_id` bigint NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `username` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `nickname` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `mobile` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `email` varchar(128) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `password` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `avatar` varchar(128) NULL DEFAULT '', `sex` tinyint NULL DEFAULT NULL, `birthday` datetime NULL DEFAULT NULL, `create_time` datetime NULL DEFAULT NULL, `update_time` datetime NULL DEFAULT NULL, `deleted` int NOT NULL, `enable` int NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`user_id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB;
